mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_WRITE_DATE, NOTICE_UPDATE_DATE, NOTICE_FILE_NAME, NOTICE_FILE_RENAME, NOTICE_FILE_PATH, NOTICE_COUNT) VALUES(#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent},DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{noticeFileName},#{noticeFileRename}, #{noticeFilePath}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_UPDATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_COUNT = NOTICE_COUNT+1 WHERE NOTICE_NO=#{noticeNo}
